about_the_game:
FurBall Beta is Live!


FurBall is a multiplayer, physics-based sports game where animals battle for athletic supremacy across a variety of incredible arenas. Play against friends across multiple platforms over the Internet.

In FurBall, you play on teams of up to 2 players on each side in a battle of sports supremacy, attempting to score goals for your team while avoiding interference by your opponents who will use their athletic ability and various weapons and power-ups to thwart your efforts. Play with or against your friends.

In this physics-based sports game, your character will kick and shoot the ball in order to get it into your team's goal. Help your team score the most points within the round's time limit to win!

Collect crazy power-ups like banana peels to knock other players down or Boost energy drinks to gain super-speed!

Customize your character with various accessories like hats, sunglasses, high top sneakers, etc. Personalize the look, feel, and even species of your player!

Use in game emotes to communicate and taunt other players.

Play across a variety of fantastic arenas including:

  • Dog Bowl Stadium
  • Kitty City
  • Puppy Island
  • Catlantis
  • Tomb of King Mutt
  • Princess Pussycat Palace
  • Moonbase

...and more to come!

Coming with cross-platform play between iOS, Android, Windows and Mac. The upcoming July 2021 release is going to be a beta release, we would love to get the game in people's hands and get feedback.
